divs: Sighting DetailsFrom 8:30-8:35pm myself amd three coworkers observed a glowing orb type object with multiple airplanes to reference size, distance and speed. It changed direction and illumination multiple times, its flight characteristics were aerodynamically impossible to modern aircraft. We all concurred that there was know was it was one of ours so to speak.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in St Charles
